price: Ey kâfirler! Bugün özür dilemeyin! Siz ancak işlediklerinizin cezasını çekeceksiniz, (denilir).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لَا تَعۡتَذِرُواْ ٱلۡيَوۡمَۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna kafarū lā taʿtadhirū al-yawma innamā tuj'zawna mā kuntum taʿmalūna
